name: ALAssetOrientation
desc: Constants to indicate the orientation of an asset.

items.name: case up
items.desc: Indicates that the picture is in its default orientation.

items.name: case down
items.desc: Indicates that the picture has been rotated through 180 degrees with respect to the up orientation.

items.name: case left
items.desc: Indicates that the picture has been rotated through 90 degrees counter-clockwise with respect to the up orientation.

items.name: case right
items.desc: Indicates that the picture has been rotated through 90 degrees clockwise with respect to the up orientation.

items.name: case upMirrored
items.desc: Indicates that the picture has been flipped horizontally with respect to the up orientation.

items.name: case downMirrored
items.desc: Indicates that the picture has been rotated through 180 degrees with respect to up orientation, and then flipped horizontally.

items.name: case leftMirrored
items.desc: Indicates that the picture has been rotated through 90 degrees counter-clockwise with respect to the up orientation, and then flipped vertically.

items.name: case rightMirrored
items.desc: Indicates that the picture has been rotated through 90 degrees clockwise with respect to the up orientation and then flipped vertically.
